quote: Holy Cow Marvin! The site looks awesome. Did you design it yourself? It's very clean... Great job!
author: George Pefanis
authorRole: NYU SPS Professor and Technical Program Manager at SiriusXM

quote: Marvin, Great job. It looks great. You are the only one who truly took everything in this semester... It was a pleasure working with you. Thanks for being an asset in class.
author: George Pefanis
authorRole: NYU SPS Professor and Technical Program Manager at SiriusXM

quote: Marvin, we wouldn't have had such impressive spreadsheets without you on the project.
author: Susan Woodland
authorRole: Senior Archivist at the American Jewish Historical Society
